title: Avira AntiVir Personal Premium 7.06.00.308 (Upgrades to 8.0)
description:

AntiVir PersonalEdition Premium
AntiVir Guard

================================

INSTALL:

:Install via `antivir_workstation_win7u_en_hp.exe`

:During installation at `Install License` screen check `Install license from file`

You are now protected till 10/11/2008. This includes all updates.
